name: A Very Wild Game of Pong
name_original: A Very Wild Game of Pong
description:
You are Rookie, you just became the Pong Champion, but your opponent stole your trophy. Are you up for the task to get it back?

To do this, you will need to use Rookie's abilities to transform to what can navigate your area the best (mainly a human). You have the option to pick between a male or female human character.

The game also features an interactive messagebox system that enhances your experience and from which you can make choices in the game.
